sourcesContent:
import tourImg01 from "../images/tour-img01.jpg";
import tourImg02 from "../images/tour-img02.jpg";
import tourImg03 from "../images/tour-img03.jpg";
import tourImg04 from "../images/tour-img04.jpg";
import tourImg05 from "../images/tour-img05.jpg";
import tourImg06 from "../images/tour-img06.jpg";
import tourImg07 from "../images/tour-img07.jpg";

const tours = [
  {
    id: "01",
    title: "Westminster Bridge",
    city: "London",
    distance: 300,
    address: "Westminster Bridge, London, UK",
    price: 99,
    maxGroupSize: 10,
    desc: "Explore the historic Westminster Bridge and enjoy stunning views of the River Thames and iconic landmarks like Big Ben and the Houses of Parliament.",
    reviews: [
      {
        name: "John Smith",
        rating: 4.6,
      },
      {
        name: "Jane Smith",
        rating: 4.8,
      },
      {
        name: "James Madison",
        rating: 4.2,
      },
      {
        name: "Mike Law",
        rating: 4.9,
      },
      {
        name: "Sarah Zoe",
        rating: 4.9,
      },
    ],
    avgRating: 4.5,
    photo: tourImg01,
    featured: true,
  },
  {
    id: "02",
    title: "Bali, Indonesia",
    city: "Bali",
    distance: 400,
    address: "Kuta, Bali, Indonesia",
    price: 99,
    maxGroupSize: 8,
    desc: "Experience the tropical paradise of Bali with its beautiful beaches, vibrant culture, and rich history. Perfect for a relaxing getaway.",
    reviews: [
      {
        name: "John Smith",
        rating: 4.6,
      },
    ],
    avgRating: 4.5,
    photo: tourImg02,
    featured: true,
  },
  {
    id: "03",
    title: "Snowy Mountains, Thailand",
    city: "Chiang Mai",
    distance: 500,
    address: "Doi Inthanon, Chiang Mai, Thailand",
    price: 99,
    maxGroupSize: 8,
    desc: "Discover the breathtaking Snowy Mountains in Thailand's northern region, with scenic views, cool weather, and hiking trails.",
    reviews: [],
    avgRating: 4.5,
    photo: tourImg03,
    featured: true,
  },
  {
    id: "04",
    title: "Beautiful Sunrise, Thailand",
    city: "Phuket",
    distance: 500,
    address: "Phang Nga Bay, Phuket, Thailand",
    price: 99,
    maxGroupSize: 8,
    desc: "Witness a mesmerizing sunrise over Phang Nga Bay, known for its limestone karsts and crystal-clear waters. A must-see for nature lovers.",
    reviews: [
      {
        name: "John Smith",
        rating: 4.6,
      },
    ],
    avgRating: 4.5,
    photo: tourImg04,
    featured: true,
  },
  {
    id: "05",
    title: "Nusa Penida, Bali, Indonesia",
    city: "Bali",
    distance: 500,
    address: "Nusa Penida, Bali, Indonesia",
    price: 99,
    maxGroupSize: 8,
    desc: "Explore Nusa Penida, an island off Bali's coast, famous for its stunning cliffs, crystal-clear waters, and vibrant marine life.",
    reviews: [],
    avgRating: 4.5,
    photo: tourImg05,
    featured: false,
  },
  {
    id: "06",
    title: "Cherry Blossoms Spring",
    city: "Kyoto",
    address: "Maruyama Park, Kyoto, Japan",
    distance: 500,
    price: 99,
    maxGroupSize: 8,
    desc: "Experience the beauty of cherry blossoms in full bloom at Maruyama Park in Kyoto, a perfect spot for hanami (flower viewing).",
    reviews: [
      {
        name: "John Smith",
        rating: 4.6,
      },
    ],
    avgRating: 4.5,
    photo: tourImg06,
    featured: false,
  },
  {
    id: "07",
    title: "Holmen Lofoten",
    city: "Lofoten",
    distance: 500,
    address: "Holmen Lofoten, Norway",
    price: 99,
    maxGroupSize: 8,
    desc: "Discover the breathtaking landscapes of Holmen Lofoten in Norway, known for its dramatic peaks, sheltered bays, and pristine beaches.",
    reviews: [],
    avgRating: 4.5,
    photo: tourImg07,
    featured: false,
  },
  {
    id: "08",
    title: "Snowy Mountains, Thailand",
    city: "Chiang Mai",
    distance: 500,
    address: "Doi Inthanon, Chiang Mai, Thailand",
    price: 99,
    maxGroupSize: 8,
    desc: "Explore the Snowy Mountains of Doi Inthanon, Thailand’s highest peak, offering cool temperatures and stunning vistas.",
    reviews: [],
    avgRating: 4.5,
    photo: tourImg03,
    featured: false,
  },
];

export default tours;
